text:
configuring your mail host should be done in WEB-
INF/classes/org/apache/lenya/net/conf.properties.
It seems better to move this configuration from its current 
obscure place to the admin GUI.
creator: vennegoor.marieke@kpmg-ct.com
A.Kuckartz@ping.de
text: Added lenya-dev@cocoon.apache.org to CC-list of this bug.
